name: Dark Souls III: Collector's Edition
summary:
Prepare to die, again with the third entry in the brutal blockbuster action-RPG franchise. A dark and brooding fantasy adventure awaits players in a vast twisted world full of fearsome beasts, devious traps and hidden secrets. The embers of a once-proud kingdom set the stage for this new adventure. Battle against fearsome enemies and bosses with a variety of weapons and magic through a mysterious land riddled with secrets.

Dark Souls III once again gives gamers the trademark sword and sorcery combat and rewarding action RPG gameplay. Players will travel across a wide variety of locations in an interconnected world of unrelenting challenge and deep RPG gameplay as they search for a way to survive the coming apocalypse.

Dark Souls III Collector's Edition includes:
10" Red Knight Statue
Prima Starter Guide
Official Dark Souls III Soundtrack
Official art book
Cloth game map
Collector's box
Dark Souls III Software
